Locale.Value:
1. [*]Kernel upgrade:109.0.5414.84
2. [!]Some problems correction and detail optimization
3. [+]Support video HEVC (H.265, etc.) FFMPEG decoding
4. [+]Super drag and drop support fast saving
5. [+]Reconstruct the appearance of the vertical tab bar and integrate the right menu
6. [+]Tab bar supports gesture&&shortcut key switching
7. [+]Vertical tab bar supports mouse scrolling to switch tabs
8. [+]Vertical tab bar supports user-defined tab width and height
9. [+]Picture in picture supports user-defined foreground auto hiding time
10. [+]Display icon or icon+title when vertical label bar is not expanded
11. [!]Repair the possible failure of extended security that is not allowed to be detected

1. [*]内核升级：109.0.5414.84
2. [!]若干问题修正与细节优化
3. [+]支持视频 HEVC(H.265 等) FFMPEG 解码
4. [+]超级拖拽支持快速保存
5. [+]重构垂直标签栏外观，并整合右菜单
6. [+]标签栏支持 手势&&快捷键 切换
7. [+]垂直标签栏支持鼠标滚动切换标签页
8. [+]垂直标签栏支持自定义标签页宽度与高度
9. [+]画中画支持自定义前景自动隐藏时间
10. [+]垂直标签栏未展开时显示 图标 或 图标+标题
11. [!]修复 不允许检测扩展安全性 可能失效问题
